name: Fist
description: The default weapon when you've got nothing else to fight with.

name: Wooden Waster
description: A wooden sword meant more for practice than actual combat.

name: Staff
description: A stout staff that also functions as a walking stick.

name: Spiked Club
description: A club, but with spikes.

name: Dagger
description: A lightweight tool for stabbin'.

name: Broad Dagger
description: A slightly-less lightweight tool for stabbin'.

name: Sai
description: From the days of Ninja vs. Samurai. Most famously used by Raphael.

name: Longsword
description: A long sword. So long you gotta use two hands.

name: Katana
description: Like a longsword, but with a cooler Japanese name.

name: Gladius
description: A sword, not as long as a longsword, but with a much cooler name.

name: Saber
description: A short, curved sword. Reminds you of pirates.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: Sword + Enchantment = Enchanted Sword

name: Dual Swords
description: You have two swords at the same time. Dual swords!!

name: War Axe
description: Can also be used to chop wood.

name: Battle Axe
description: Warning: do not use to chop wood.

name: Whip
description: Used by Indiana Jones to fight Nazis.

name: Flail
description: Kinda like a spiked club and whip put together. Dangerous for everyone involved.

name: Boomerang
description: A ranged attack with unlimited throws!

name: Slingshot
description: Made popular by the legendary Dennis warrior.

name: Bow
description: Shoots arrows. Pairs well with a feathered cap.

name: Crossbow
description: Shoots bolts. This thing doesn't mess around.

name: Water Staff
description: Used to cast water magic.

name: Fire Staff
description: Used to cast fire magic.

name: Earth Staff
description: Used to cast earth magic.

name: Air Staff
description: Used to cast air magic.
